root: ^Nicholas stood out back behind the pizza restaurant, before the rusted door.
^Carbone’s was the pride of the town, the best place to get a slice. Don Carbone was proud of it’s reputation.
^But pizza was not the man’s main business.
^Nicholas knocked four times, bring sure to leave a distinct but brief pause before the fourth. A slit in the door slid open.
^Nick, Sylvia, The Don’s been waiting for you. Get in here.
^Ah, Nicholas! So fine to see you, my boy. Good to see Sylvie here's taking good care of you.
^I heard you're dealing with some sort of amnesia business.
^Yes, Don. I have lost a bit of my memory.
^Well, you better get over it soon, yes? Can't have my best info guy forgetting everything he learns.
^Of course Don. My recent memory since the incident is just fine, and I've been recovering well.
^But we have some new problems we need your help with, Don.
^That's right. You remember my brother, Cooper.
^Well of course, the garbage man turned squeaky clean.
^Although, a man like that... is never really clean for goo.
^Anyways, how's he enjoying the honest life?
^Well sir,  I couldn't quite tell you. I don't speak with him much anymore. But he's been helping me while I've been recovering, and-
^He's dissapeared. I haven't been able to contact him at all.
^And what's to say he hasn't just abandoned you like he did me?
^Plus, we found his wallet and keys in his apartment with the door unlocked. Why would anyone leave these behind unless they were kidnapped!
^Please, Don, you gotta help us. Anything you can do. You have people, you know things, right? Who could have done this?
^As you know I am a very generous man. I love my community and my excellent business parters.
^But at the end of the day, that's just what I run here. A business.
^If you want me to help you, what you're asking for is a transaction.
^.. I'm sorry, I'm just a bit strapped for cash and-
^because I am a generous man, I will give you a good deal.
^If you can get me those numbers, the ones I asked you for before you went AWOL on me,
^I'll help find that slippery brother of yours in lieu of your fee.
